definitions.definition: To make (something old or outdated ) up to date , or modern in style or function by adding or changing equipment, designs, etc.
To become modern in appearance, or adopt modern ways

main_definition: ( transitive ) To make (something old or outdated ) up to date , or modern in style or function by adding or changing equipment, designs, etc.
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To become modern in appearance, or adopt modern ways
